SELECT id as id, name as name, pw as pw, fail_cnt as failCnt, auth_code as authCode, reg_date as regDate, upt_date as uptDate from USER where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into USER (id, name, pw, fail_cnt, auth_code, reg_date) values (#{id},#{name},#{pw},0,#{authCode} ,sysdate())
